metadata.title: CVE-2021-45116 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Django 2.2 before 2.2.26, 3.2 before 3.2.11, and 4.0 before 4.0.1. Due to leveraging the Django Template Language's variable resolution logic, the dictsort template filter was potentially vulnerable to information disclosure, or an unintended method call, if passed a suitably crafted key.

criterions.comment: python-django package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.2.20-1ubuntu0.4').
